about_the_game:
[GAME CANCELLED]

Alight is an open world base building survival crafting game.

Stranded in the darkness, survive and build a base scattered across the lunar surface to generate electricity and alight the moon as you upgrade your equipment, struggle for oxygen, and escape fearsome monsters. Singleplayer only, you will survive, gather, craft, build, and explore.

Surviving The Darkness

Survive against fearsome monsters that will come for you in the dark. Hide, run to the light, or attempt to face them head on with your glowsticks.

Generating Electricity

Generate electricity from different sources and use it to power your base, unlock new blueprints, and alight the moon to protect you against the monsters.

As you explore and progress you'll discover new and more powerful energy sources to take advantage of and unlock exciting new technology.

Exploring The Lunar Surface

Explore many unique biomes across the dark lunar surface, ranging from the rocky lunars to lush luminescent forests. There are 5 unique biomes for you to discover in this open world, but some will be tougher than others, or require special gear to survive!

Craft and construct new gear and vehicles to help you move around faster and in style - lunar boots, hoverboard, and hoverbike!

Base Building

Oxygen is limited, so while your suit converts light into oxygen, you will still need a closed base to store and fabricate (craft) new items.

You can also farm and grow different plants for food.

Gathering & Crafting

Gather different plants and metals to be able to craft many different items, structures, and gear.

Around the lunar surface you will find locked knowledge that will require enough electricity to unlock, and these will unlock new technology for you to craft, but be aware of the monsters lurking in the shadows!
